lines.text:
[spoon-feeding soup to the small boy]
Now just a little bit more. Do it for baby Jesus.
Baby Jesus wouldn't eat this rotten junk.
Can we go to the Souks and get a camel ride?
I would like to visit the cemetery again. What'd I say wrong?
Yeah, let's go to the cemetery. We can see Mommy.

[remembering what he had heard at a local Arab funeral]
Yeah, and afterwards we can kill a lamb and have a feast.
Andrew, what are you talking about?

[suddenly withdrawn, sensing he has said something inappropriate]
Nothing.
'Cause I don't think it's a good idea.
[Andrew and Uncle Will try to keep from laughing]
[Uncle Will now laughs openly as Miles leaves the table]
